Embra's Privacy Policy

In Short:  We may transfer, store, and process your information in countries other than your own.
For instance, depending on the type of request you submit, we may ask you to provide certain information so that we can match the information you provide with the information we already have on file, or we may contact you through a communication method (e.g., phone or email) that you have previously provided to us.
However, we may retain some information in our files to prevent fraud, troubleshoot problems, assist with any investigations, enforce our legal terms and/or comply with applicable legal requirements.
If you submit the request through an authorized agent, we may need to collect additional information to verify your identity before processing your request.
In Short:  We keep your information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy notice unless otherwise required by law.
In Short:  We may use cookies and other tracking technologies to collect and store your information.

We automatically collect certain information when you visit, use, or navigate the Services.

We may process your information to respond to your inquiries and solve any potential issues you might have with the requested service.

We may process your information where we believe it is necessary to protect your vital interests or the vital interests of a third party, such as situations involving potential threats to the safety of any person.

Embra's Privacy Policy

We will use and retain the collected personal information as needed to provide the Services or for:

We process the contents of emails you send and receive through the Service, as well as the email addresses of the people you communicate with through the Service (collectively "Email Content Data"), on your behalf and subject to your instructions.

We process the contents of calendar events created and searched through the Service, as well as the email addresses of the calendar event participants through the Service (collectively "Calendar Content Data"), on your behalf and subject to your instructions.

We collect location data such as information about your device's location, which can be either precise or imprecise.
